article.title: Directions to Lawrenceville - Central-Southern New Jersey U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Get driving directions for the Central-Southern New Jersey U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Princeton Pike Corporate Center
Lawrenceville, NJ 08648-2311

From Trenton:Take Route 1 North or Alternate Route 1 North towards Lawrenceville. After you cross Route 546 (Baker's Basin/ Franklin Corner Road) look for signs for 95 South/295 South. Take the 95 South ramp heading towards Pennsylvania. Take the first exit which is Exit 8B, Princeton Pike North. Turn right at the first light on to Lenox Drive into the Princeton Pike Corporate Center.

From South Jersey (Camden/Cherry Hill):Interstate 295 North towards Princeton/New York. (Interstate 295 North will become 95 South just past Exit 67 at Route 1). Take the first exit after that point, which is Exit 8B, Princeton Pike North. Turn right at the first light on to Lenox Drive in the Princeton Pike Corporate Center.

From Pennsylvania:Use Interstate 95 North over the Scudder's Falls Bridge into New Jersey. Go approximately 8 miles to Exit 8B, Princeton Pike North. Turn right at the first light on to Lenox Drive, in the Princeton Pike Corporate Center.

From Northern New Jersey:Take Route 1 South towards Lawrenceville, past the Quaker Bridge Mall. Stay in the right lane looking for 295 South/95 South signs. Take the first ramp for Interstate 95 South, towards Pennsylvania. Take the first Exit which is Exit 8B, Princeton Pike North. Turn right at the first light on to Lenox Drive in the Princeton Pike Corporate Center.

From Northwest New Jersey:Use 287 South, to Exit #17 US 206/202 South towards Somerville/Flemington. Follow signs for US 206 South to Somerville/Princeton. Once in Princeton, continue on 206 South into Lawrenceville. Turn left at the light onto Province Line Road. Make a right at the next light onto Princeton Pike. Turn left at light onto Lenox Drive into the Princeton Pike Corporate Center complex.

New Jersey Turnpike (from North or South):Take Exit 7A. This puts you on 195, head WEST, towards Trenton. Take Interstate 295 North towards Princeton, (in approx. 8 miles, this road will become 95 South just past Exit 67 at Route 1). Continue on 95 South, take the first exit, which is Exit 8B, Princeton Pike North. Turn right at the first light on to Lenox Drive in the Princeton Pike Corporate Center.​​​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Get driving directions for the Central-Southern New Jersey U.S. Export Assistance Center.
